title: Jon Finn - Advanced Modern Rock Guitar Improvisation (pdf)
description:
Description
-----------

Renowned Berklee College of Music faculty guitarist Jon Finn, combines his experience, education, and stylistic versatility in this eclectic series of lessons for aspiring rock guitarists. Jon's innovative approach is unique, fun, and challenging. The book offers a well researched original take on the use of pentatonic scales in rock improvisation. Using his "Warp Refraction Principle", which takes into account the major third tuning interval between the second and third strings, Jon presents a series of five vertical patterns applied in two-string increments throughout the fretboard. The philosophy behind this project is to present concepts and techniques as a thought process rather than simply providing a reference manual.


Note from uploader
------------------

There is a newer version of this book (2005) available:


If you like this e-book and want to support the author -- please buy a paper copy
